verses.kjv: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
verses.web: I exhort therefore, first of all, that petitions, prayers, intercessions, and givings of thanks be made for all men:
verses.ct: First and foremost, I urge that requests, prayers, intercessions, and thanksgiving be offered for everyone —

verses.kjv: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
verses.web: for kings and all who are in high places, that we may lead a tranquil and quiet life in all godliness and reverence.
verses.ct: for kings and all those in positions of authority — so that we can live peaceful, quiet lives marked by godliness and integrity.

verses.kjv: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
verses.web: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Savior,
verses.ct: This is good and pleasing to God our Savior,

verses.kjv: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
verses.web: who desires all people to be saved and come to full knowledge of the truth.
verses.ct: who wants all people to be saved and to come to a full understanding of the truth.

verses.kjv: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
verses.web: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
verses.ct: There is one God, and there is one mediator between God and humanity — the man Christ Jesus,

verses.kjv: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
verses.web: who gave himself as a ransom for all, the testimony in its own times,
verses.ct: who gave himself as a ransom for everyone. This was the testimony given at just the right time,

verses.kjv: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
verses.web: to which I was appointed a preacher and an apostle—I am telling the truth in Christ, not lying—a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.
verses.ct: and I was appointed as a preacher and an apostle to share it — I'm telling the truth in Christ, I'm not lying — as a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.

verses.kjv: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
verses.web: I desire therefore that the men in every place pray, lifting up holy hands without anger and doubting.
verses.ct: So I want men everywhere to pray, lifting up holy hands, free from anger and doubt.

verses.kjv: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
verses.web: In the same way, that women also adorn themselves in decent clothing, with modesty and propriety, not just with braided hair, gold, pearls, or expensive clothing,
verses.ct: In the same way, I want women to dress modestly and with good sense — not drawing attention with elaborate hairstyles, gold jewelry, pearls, or expensive clothes,

verses.kjv: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
verses.web: but with good works, which is appropriate for women professing godliness.
verses.ct: but with good works, which is what's fitting for women who claim to honor God.

verses.kjv: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
verses.web: Let a woman learn in quietness with full submission.
verses.ct: A woman should learn quietly and with complete submission.

verses.kjv: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
verses.web: But I don’t permit a woman to teach, nor to exercise authority over a man, but to be in quietness.
verses.ct: I don't allow a woman to teach or to have authority over a man. Instead, she is to remain quiet.

verses.kjv: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
verses.web: For Adam was formed first, then Eve.
verses.ct: Adam was created first, and then Eve.

verses.kjv: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
verses.web: Adam wasn’t deceived, but the woman, being deceived, has fallen into disobedience;
verses.ct: It wasn't Adam who was deceived — it was the woman who was deceived and fell into sin.

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
verses.web: but she will be saved through her childbearing, if they continue in faith, love, and sanctification with sobriety.
verses.ct: Yet she will be saved through childbearing, if they continue in faith, love, and holiness, living with self-control.
